info.infotext: Well i guess you took a picture with a random tiger. Idk where i was??
We have many many cute photos.
The big 2…0 … this was also a really nice experience. Cocktails and great food.
I absolutely love this picture. It is one of my all time favs. Its in Devin and your brother took it. We both look so happy and content.
As the years progress i can see you becoming more comfortable. You take more pictures of you and look stunning i am so proud of you.
This is from the birthday again.
Cute, cozy, sweet. A killer combo.
Fall vibes. The reality here is that when we dont have many photos together in a year i like to show you of :3.
THIS IS MY GIRLFRIEND I CANNOT BELIEVE IT.
I wanted to pop the balloon even back then (this urge comes back in later years) they look so popable!
